dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1155 IS: To amend the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 to make technical corrections.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Hyde-Smith introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: To amend the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 to make technical corrections.

section.header: Technical corrections to the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000
section.text: Section 103 of the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 (22 U.S.C. 7102) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (16), by striking paragraph (9) and inserting paragraph (11); and
in paragraph (17), by striking paragraph (9) or (10) and inserting paragraph (11) or (12).
